full_summary:
================================्दDetails for a 10,000L Aircraft Refueller Request for Proposal================================

**Title**: 10,000L Aircraft Refueller, Road and Off-Road Capability 6X6 Wheel Drive

**Reference Number**: CB-574-75525674

**Amendment Number**: 6

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-246747/A

**Publication Date**: 26 January 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: 11 March 2024 at 14:00 EST



### Overview
----------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure six (6) 10,000L Aircraft Refueller, Road and Off-Road Capability 6X6 Wheel Drive units, along with integrated logistics support (ILS) deliverables. The required delivery dates and locations are:

*   CFB Petawawa
*   CFB Val Cartier
*   CFB Edmonton

The requested delivery date is within 120 days after contract award.

### Requirements
----------------

There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurement.

Bid documentation may be submitted in either English or French.

### Contact Information
-------------------------

For any queries, please contact Mylène Faguy at:

*   Email: [mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca](mailto:mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 343 550-2072

### Procurement Details
------------------------

*   The procurement method is competitive – open bidding.
*   The selection criterion is the lowest price.
*   The procurement category is Goods and Services (G&S).
*   The notice type is a Request for Proposal.
*   The regions of opportunity are worldwide.
*   The regions of delivery are:
    *   Edmonton
    *   Quebec (excluding NCR)
    *   Petawawa
    *   Canada


### Additional Information
---------------------------

The applicable trade agreements are:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Per
